<a id="GDExtension"></a>

# GDExtension

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A native library for GDExtension.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The **GDExtension** resource type represents a [shared library](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shared_library) which can expand the functionality of the engine. The [GDExtensionManager](GDExtensionManager.md) singleton is responsible for loading, reloading, and unloading **GDExtension** resources.

\ **Note:** GDExtension itself is not a scripting language and has no relation to [GDScript](GDScript.md) resources.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [GDExtension overview](../tutorials/scripting/gdextension/what_is_gdextension.md)

- [GDExtension example in C++](../tutorials/scripting/cpp/gdextension_cpp_example.md)

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_GDExtension_InitializationLevel"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **InitializationLevel**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_GDExtension_InitializationLevel)

<a id="GDExtension_constant_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_CORE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[InitializationLevel](GDExtension.md#enum_GDExtension_InitializationLevel) **INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_CORE** = `0`

The library is initialized at the same time as the core features of the engine.<a id="GDExtension_constant_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SERVERS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[InitializationLevel](GDExtension.md#enum_GDExtension_InitializationLevel) **INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SERVERS** = `1`

The library is initialized at the same time as the engine's servers (such as [RenderingServer](RenderingServer.md) or [PhysicsServer3D](PhysicsServer3D.md)).<a id="GDExtension_constant_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SCENE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[InitializationLevel](GDExtension.md#enum_GDExtension_InitializationLevel) **INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_SCENE** = `2`

The library is initialized at the same time as the engine's scene-related classes.<a id="GDExtension_constant_INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_EDITOR"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[InitializationLevel](GDExtension.md#enum_GDExtension_InitializationLevel) **INITIALIZATION_LEVEL_EDITOR** = `3`

The library is initialized at the same time as the engine's editor classes. Only happens when loading the GDExtension in the editor.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Method Descriptions

<a id="GDExtension_method_get_minimum_library_initialization_level"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[InitializationLevel](GDExtension.md#enum_GDExtension_InitializationLevel) **get_minimum_library_initialization_level**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#GDExtension_method_get_minimum_library_initialization_level)

Returns the lowest level required for this extension to be properly initialized (see the [InitializationLevel](GDExtension.md#enum_GDExtension_InitializationLevel) enum).
